channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Perfect 1oz Rarity
channel.desc: This is the last chance to add a 2024 High Relief 1oz Palladium American Eagle graded perfect Proof 70UCAM to your collection. Struck from .9995 fine Palladium and a miniscule mintage of 7500 this rarity features Adolph Weinman designs on both sides.
